org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.restful.server

Class RestfulDiffuserServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.restful.server.RestfulDiffuserServer

  • public class RestfulDiffuserServer
extends java.lang.Object
    The RESTful diffuser server that listens to the specified URI and uses the resources and information contained in the specified JAX-RS application.
    Author:
    Robert Philipp

      • server

        private final org.glassfish.grizzly.http.server.HttpServer server

    • Constructor Detail

      • RestfulDiffuserServer

        public RestfulDiffuserServer(java.net.URI serverUri,
                     RestfulDiffuserApplication application,
                     java.lang.String diffuserManagerResource,
                     java.lang.String diffuserManagerContentPath)
        Creates and starts the RESTful diffuser server listening at the specified server URI and using the specified JAX-RS application.
        Parameters:
        serverUri - The URI for this RESTful diffuser (i.e. the URI at which others would call this diffuser)
        application - The JAX-RS application that contains information about the resources that contain the JAX-RS bindings

    • Method Detail

      • createHttpServer

        private static org.glassfish.grizzly.http.server.HttpServer createHttpServer(java.net.URI serverUri,
                                                            RestfulDiffuserApplication application)

      • setStaticContentLocation

        private static void setStaticContentLocation(org.glassfish.grizzly.http.server.HttpServer server,
                            java.lang.String diffuserManagerResource,
                            java.lang.String diffuserManagerContentPath)
        Sets the location of the "static" content used to manage the diffusers. The content should include the html, css, and javascript that is served up to allow the user to add, delete, query the diffusers.
        Parameters:
        server - The HTTP server that serves up this static content (and the REST content)
        diffuserManagerResource - The resource of the diffuser manager. For example, the URI of the diffuser manager resource will be http://ip.address:port/[diffuserManagerResource] where the [diffuserManagerResource] means the content of that variable
        diffuserManagerContentPath - The path to the directory containing the html, css, and javascript that is served up as a web page to manage the server.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the RestfulDiffuserServer

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the RestfulDiffuserServer

        public static void main(java.lang.String... args)
                 throws java.io.IOException

        Throws:
